attributes.action: Raise the limit on max earnings for the 40% tax bracket.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This tax bracket should be for the real high earners and should be set at a level people can afford it.
Since the option of opting out of the company car polocy and taking a car allowence a lot of people have effectivly been taxed twice as the extra funds are included as salery.
The 40% limit would be fairer set at somthing like £58000 per year.
